doc-checker.activateOnChange.description: The extension will be activated when a file is changed. Set to 'false' to disable this feature.

doc-checker.class.description: Check that all classes have a docstring. Set to 'false' to disable this check.

doc-checker.debounceDelay.description: Specifies the delay, in milliseconds, before the checker runs after changes are made when 'modify' mode is activated.

doc-checker.function.description: Check that all functions have updated docstring. Set to 'false' to disable this check.

doc-checker.languages.description: Specify the languages for which the checker should run.

doc-checker.method.description: Check that all methods have updated docstring. Set to 'false' to disable this check.

doc-checker.mode.description: Choose when to activate the checker. 'modify' activates on any file modification, 'save' activates on file save.

doc-checker.module.description: Check that all modules have a docstring. Set to 'false' to disable this check.

doc-checker.parameter.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated parameters. Set to 'false' to disable.

doc-checker.return.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated returns. Set to 'false' to disable.

doc-checker.throw.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated throws. Set to 'false' to disable.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
